overview: A brand new 3 lane production featuring a new group of hoodlums, straight lads and the usual horny blokes you’d associate with Triga.Get your medals out and show them off proudly lads, flash them about with this brand new 100 minute British fuck fest film featuring the fit as fuck Geordie Jackson the bulked tattooed hung like a horse Northern straight fella who’ll smash your ring at the back of the flip of a coin if you cross him correctly....also starring the southern stunning JDXXX and muscle fit-fuck Tommy GunnXXX. Their all back up to no good as usual and as always getting their trophies polished are proudly out on dispaly......
title: XXX-Team-GB
